resources.string:
HOW TO USE ?
 	 1 - write valid key or click on circular crypti icon to generate a random key
 	 2 - paste or type your [ encrypted text/Original text ]
 	 3 - click on [Encrypting/Decrypting Button]
 
 
 *[ EACH TIME YOU CAN ONLY GENERATE 5 KEY ]
